content: notes from video easy to follow instruction make different sizes great for the environment first row of loops should be 19 ****not***** 18 for small bag start with 21 chain then 20 single_crochet in first row repeat for 5-6 row first row of loops should be 19 loops then repeat you will need about 150-200 grams of 100% cotton yarn for large bag start with 31 chain then 30 single_crochet in first row repeat for 5-6 row first row of loops should be 29 loops then repeat you will need about 200-250 grams of 100% cotton yarn
